bug.author: andreas-eberle
bug.description:
When running my configuration with CUDA default precision, it works. However, when I run it with half precision, I get the following error: <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/andreas-eberle/0992b97fe8062f148344a37f712273ce>https://gist.github.com/andreas-eberle/0992b97fe8062f148344a37f712273ce</denchmark-link>
This is the configuration I used. <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/andreas-eberle/64eec96888651dd2543c8bc0ecf3501d>https://gist.github.com/andreas-eberle/64eec96888651dd2543c8bc0ecf3501d</denchmark-link>
The input I use are 40x40 images with one channel.

comments.comment: This issue should be already fixed on current master.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
